mapper.delete: DELETE agenda_summary FROM JOIN agenda ON .agenda_id = agenda.agenda_id JOIN agenda_item ON agenda.agenda_id = agenda_item.agenda_id JOIN agenda_summary ON agenda_summary.item_id = agenda_item.item_id JOIN user ON user.user_id = agenda_summary.summarizer_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM cooperation_member WHERE cooperation_member.user_id = user.user_id AND .cooperation_id = cooperation_member.cooperation_id )
